verses.verse: וַ֠יִּסְעוּ <WH5265> journeyed כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדַ֨ת <WH5712> And all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <WH3478> of Israel מִמִּדְבַּר־ <WH4057> from the wilderness סִ֛ין <WH5512> of Sin לְמַסְעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4550> after their journeys עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֣י <WH6310> according to the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> and pitched בִּרְפִידִ֔ים <WH7508> in Rephidim וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מַ֖יִם <WH4325> and [there was] no water לִשְׁתֹּ֥ת <WH8354> to drink הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> for the people

וַיָּ֤רֶב <WH7378> did chide הָעָם֙ <WH5971> Wherefore the people עִם־ <WH5973> with מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> with Moses וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and said תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> Give לָ֥נוּ מַ֖יִם <WH4325> us water וְנִשְׁתֶּ֑ה <WH8354> that we may drink וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses מַה־ <WH4100> Why תְּרִיבוּן֙ <WH7378> unto them Why chide עִמָּדִ֔י <WH5978> me מַה־ <WH4100> Why תְּנַסּ֖וּן <WH5254> ye with me? wherefore do ye tempt אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Jehovah

וַיִּצְמָ֨א <WH6770> thirsted שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> there הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And the people לַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> there for water וַיָּ֥לֶן <WH3885> murmured הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and the people עַל־ <WH5921> against מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> against Moses וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why זֶּה֙ <WH2088> now הֶעֱלִיתָ֣נוּ <WH5927> Wherefore [is] this [that] thou hast brought מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> us up out of Egypt לְהָמִ֥ית <WH4191> to kill אֹתִ֛י <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנַ֥י <WH1121> us and our children וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִקְנַ֖י <WH4735> and our cattle בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <WH6772> thirst

וַיִּצְעַ֤ק <WH6817> cried מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> What shall I do לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> folk הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this ע֥וֹד <WH5750> more מְעַ֖ט <WH4592> almost some וּסְקָלֻֽנִי׃ <WH5619> ready to stone

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses עֲבֹר֙ <WH5674> Go on לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people וְקַ֥ח <WH3947> and take אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> for מִזִּקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> with thee of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמַטְּךָ֗ <WH4294> and thy rod אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הִכִּ֤יתָ <WH5221> wherewith thou smotest בּוֹ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הַיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> the river קַ֥ח <WH3947> take בְּיָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> in thine hand וְהָלָֽכְתָּ׃ <WH1980> and go

הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold עֹמֵד֩ <WH5975> Behold I will stand לְפָנֶ֨יךָ <WH6440> before שָּׁ֥ם ׀ <WH8033> there עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַצּוּר֮ <WH6697> thee there upon the rock בְּחֹרֵב֒ <WH2722> in Horeb וְהִכִּ֣יתָ <WH5221> and thou shalt smite בַצּ֗וּר <WH6697> the rock וְיָצְא֥וּ <WH3318> and there shall come מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> at מַ֖יִם <WH4325> water וְשָׁתָ֣ה <WH8354> may drink הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> out of it that the people וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> did כֵּן֙ <WH3651> so מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> so in the sight זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> And he called שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> of the place מַסָּ֖ה <WH4532> Massah וּמְרִיבָ֑ה <WH4809> and Meribah עַל־ <WH5921> because רִ֣יב ׀ <WH7379> because of the chiding בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְעַ֨ל <WH5921> and because נַסֹּתָ֤ם <WH5254> and because they tempted אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הֲיֵ֧שׁ <WH3426> Is יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּקִרְבֵּ֖נוּ <WH7130> among אִם־ <WH518> or אָֽיִן׃ <WH369> else פ
וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> Then came עֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> Amalek וַיִּלָּ֥חֶם <WH3898> and fought עִם־ <WH5973> against יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> with Israel בִּרְפִידִֽם׃ <WH7508> in Rephidim

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> unto Joshua בְּחַר־ <WH977> Choose us out לָ֣נוּ אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> men וְצֵ֖א <WH3318> and go out הִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> fight בַּעֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> with Amalek מָחָ֗ר <WH4279> to morrow אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I נִצָּב֙ <WH5324> I will stand עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> on the top הַגִּבְעָ֔ה <WH1389> of the hill וּמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> with the rod הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God בְּיָדִֽי׃ <WH3027> in mine hand

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> did יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> So Joshua כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after אָֽמַר־ <WH559> had said לוֹ֙ מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> as Moses לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> to him and fought בַּעֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> with Amalek וּמֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> and Moses אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> Aaron וְח֔וּר <WH2354> and Hur עָל֖וּ <WH5927> went up רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> to the top הַגִּבְעָֽה׃ <WH1389> of the hill

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יָרִ֥ים <WH7311> held up מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And it came to pass when Moses יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand וְגָבַ֣ר <WH1396> prevailed יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> that Israel וְכַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after יָנִ֛יחַ <WH5117> and when he let down יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand וְגָבַ֥ר <WH1396> prevailed עֲמָלֵֽק׃ <WH6002> Amalek

וִידֵ֤י <WH3027> hands מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> But Moses' כְּבֵדִ֔ים <WH3515> [were] heavy וַיִּקְחוּ־ <WH3947> and they took אֶ֛בֶן <WH68> a stone וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> and put תַחְתָּ֖יו <WH8478> under וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> [it] under him and he sat עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> on וְאַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> thereon and Aaron וְח֜וּר <WH2354> and Hur תָּֽמְכ֣וּ <WH8551> stayed up בְיָדָ֗יו <WH3027> his hands מִזֶּ֤ה <WH2088> one אֶחָד֙ <WH259> the one on the one side וּמִזֶּ֣ה <WH2088> side אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> and the other on the other side וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> Thus יָדָ֛יו <WH3027> and his hands אֱמוּנָ֖ה <WH530> were steady עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּ֥א <WH935> until the going down הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> of the sun

וַיַּחֲלֹ֧שׁ <WH2522> discomfited יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> עֲמָלֵ֥ק <WH6002> Amalek וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> and his people לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> of the sword פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses כְּתֹ֨ב <WH3789> Write זֹ֤את <WH2063> as זִכָּרוֹן֙ <WH2146> this [for] a memorial בַּסֵּ֔פֶר <WH5612> in a book וְשִׂ֖ים <WH7760> and rehearse בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> [it] in the ears יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> of Joshua כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָחֹ֤ה <WH4229> for I will utterly אֶמְחֶה֙ <WH4229> put out אֶת־ <WH853> זֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> the remembrance עֲמָלֵ֔ק <WH6002> of Amalek מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> from under heaven
וַיִּ֥בֶן <WH1129> built מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> an altar וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and called שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD נִסִּֽי׃ <WH5251> is my Banner

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> For he said כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָד֙ <WH3027> able עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֣ס <WH3676> sworn יָ֔הּ <WH3050> Because the LORD מִלְחָמָ֥ה <WH4421> [will have] war לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [that] the LORD בַּֽעֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> with Amalek מִדֹּ֖ר <WH1755> from generation דֹּֽר׃ <WH1755> to generation פ
